package PowertrainControlSystem {

  // Functional Requirements
  requirement StartEngine : "The system shall start the engine upon receiving a fuel control command."
  requirement GenerateTorque : "The system shall generate torque according to a predetermined order."
  requirement AmplifyTorque : "The system shall amplify the generated torque."
  requirement TransmitTorque : "The system shall transmit the amplified torque."
  requirement DistributeTorque : "The system shall distribute the transmitted torque to the drive wheels."
  requirement HaltOperations : "The system shall halt relevant operational processes upon detecting a stall signal."
  requirement EngineStartShutdown : "The system shall control engine start and shutdown."
  requirement PowerTransmission : "The system shall transmit power from fuel commands to actual wheel output torque."
  requirement EfficientPowerDelivery : "The system shall ensure efficient and coordinated power delivery."
  requirement ReliablePowerResponse : "The system shall provide users with a reliable power response."
  requirement HandlingExperience : "The system shall ensure a good handling experience."

  // Non-Functional Requirements
  requirement Reliability : "The system shall be reliable."
  requirement Performance : "The system shall have high performance."

}
c

package VehicleSafetyAndSecurity

  // Functional Requirements
  requirement Safety_Protection <<safety>> "Enhance the protection of the driver and passengers during driving."
  requirement AntiTheft <<security>> "Prevent unauthorized access and theft of the vehicle."
  requirement ConvenientAccess <<security>> "Provide convenient access for authorized users."

  // Non-Functional Requirements
  requirement Reliability <<quality>> "The system shall operate reliably under all expected conditions."
  requirement Durability <<quality>> "The system shall withstand the rigors of normal use and environmental conditions."

  // Parts
  part Interior {
    part AlarmSystem
    part SeatBelts
    part FrontRowSeats
    part DriversAirbag
  }
  part BodyAssembly {
    part VehicleBody
    part Bumper
    part KeylessEntrySystem
  }

  // Relationships
  Interior realizes Safety_Protection
  BodyAssembly realizes Safety_Protection
  KeylessEntrySystem realizes ConvenientAccess
  KeylessEntrySystem realizes AntiTheft
  
endpackage

block: SpacecraftTrajectorySampler
  
  Property: liftoffTime : Time
  Property: samplingInterval : Time
  Property: numSamples : Integer
  
  Requirement:
    - The system shall sample the spacecraft trajectory during the ascent phase.
    - The system shall use the mission liftoff time as the reference time zero, measured in seconds.
    - The system shall be able to take the UTC liftoff time of the mission as the reference time.
    - The system shall collect key parameters including the position and velocity of the spacecraft at different time points.
    - Each set of sampled data shall associate a specific time point with the corresponding position and velocity data.
    - The three-dimensional position and velocity shall be described in a Cartesian coordinate system.
    - The units of position shall be meters.
    - The units of velocity shall be meters per second.
    - The system shall record multiple sampling points during the ascent phase.
    - Each sampling point shall contain explicit information on time, position, and velocity.
    - The system shall provide accurate data support for subsequent trajectory analysis and performance evaluation.
c

block: System
  Property: name "Photo Capture System"
  Property: description "Enables users to obtain photos from real-world scenes."

  Block: Focusing
    Property: name "Focusing Mechanism"
    Property: description "Automatically focuses on the selected scene."

    Action: focus
      Input: scene "Selected scene"
      Output: focusedImage "Intermediate image after focusing"

  Block: Capture
    Property: name "Image Capture Mechanism"
    Property: description "Captures the final photo based on the focused image."

    Action: capture
      Input: focusedImage "Intermediate image after focusing"
      Output: photo "Final captured photo"

  Action: capturePhoto
    Input: scene "Selected scene"
    Output: photo "Final captured photo"
    Sequence:
      Focusing.focus
      Capture.capture
c

block: PhotographySystem
  {
    Property: sceneSelection
    Property: focusStatus
    Property: image
    
    Requirement:
      "The system shall allow users to select a scene."
      "The system shall focus the selected scene to ensure optimal image sharpness."
      "The system shall generate a final image upon successful focus."
      "The system shall automatically perform focusing and shooting operations in sequence."
      "The system shall provide users with a convenient one-click shooting experience."
      "The system shall ensure the clarity and quality of the photos."
    
    Action: capturePhoto
      {
        Trigger: focusStatus = "clear"
        Effect: image = generateImage(sceneSelection)
      }
    
    Action: focusScene
      {
        Trigger: sceneSelection != null
        Effect: focusStatus = "clear"
      }
  }
c

block: Vehicle
  {
    Property: mass
      Type: Real
      Value: 2000
    Property: gearPosition
      Type: String
      Value: Neutral
    Property: throttlePosition
      Type: Real
      Value: 0
    Property: driver
      Type: Driver
      Value: Alice
  }

Block: Driver
  {
    Property: name
      Type: String
      Value: Alice
  }

Block: Engine
  {
    Property: power
      Type: Real
      Value: 150
  }

Vehicle.hasPart Engine
Vehicle.hasPart Driver

State: Initial
  {
    Vehicle.mass = 2000
    Vehicle.gearPosition = Neutral
    Vehicle.throttlePosition = 0
    Vehicle.driver = Alice
  }

State: Second
  {
    Vehicle.mass = 1500
    Vehicle.gearPosition = Second
    Vehicle.throttlePosition = 0.5
    Vehicle.driver = Bob
  }

Transition: Initial -> Second
c

block: System
  Property: simpleMass
  Property: totalMass
  
Block: simpleThing
  Property: simpleMass
  
Block: compositeThing
  Property: simpleMass
  Property: subcomponents
    Multiplicity: 1..*
    Type: Block
  
Constraint: totalMass = simpleMass + sum(subcomponents.totalMass)

    Input: object : Object
    Input: minMassThreshold : Real
    Output: filteredTotalMass : Real

package VehicleDynamicsModel {

  // Requirements
  Requirement req_vehicle_mass "Vehicle mass shall be input by the user."
  Requirement req_wheel_power "Wheel power shall be input by the user."
  Requirement req_aerodynamic_drag_coefficient "Aerodynamic drag coefficient shall be input by the user."
  Requirement req_rolling_resistance_coefficient "Rolling resistance coefficient shall be input by the user."
  Requirement req_initial_speed "Initial speed shall be input by the user."
  Requirement req_initial_position "Initial position shall be input by the user."
  Requirement req_time_step "Time step for simulation shall be defined."
  Requirement req_velocity_prediction "System shall predict vehicle velocity."
  Requirement req_acceleration_prediction "System shall predict vehicle acceleration."
  Requirement req_displacement_prediction "System shall predict vehicle displacement."

  // Parameters
  Parameter vehicleMass : Real
  Parameter wheelPower : Real
  Parameter aerodynamicDragCoefficient : Real
  Parameter rollingResistanceCoefficient : Real
  Parameter initialSpeed : Real
  Parameter initialPosition : Real
  Parameter timeStep : Real

  // Variables
  Variable currentSpeed
